plot: Andy Cohen gathers the top 20 moments from the Real Housewives' reunions. From walk outs, put downs and blow ups, these unforgettable moments make the list.

In the seventh season's "Lost Footage Special," we see never-aired housewife happenings including make-ups, shake-ups and exclusive moments from the reunion. Unlikely pairings include a double date with Vicki, Brooks, Gretchen and Slade, and Tamra meets an old foe for drinks. Heather and Alexis each pursue their dream careers, while Tamra comes to terms with her son Ryan's skepticism about her engagement. Serious showdowns at the reunion arise over the wives' various plastic surgeries and a special visitor drops by.—Anonymous
